Label.en: The process took two years, two months, and five days... and was well documented
Label.fr: La construction a pris deux ans, deux mois et cinq jour. Elle est bien documentée.
Label.es: The process took two years, two months, and five days... and was well documented
Label.zh: The process took two years, two months, and five days... and was well documented

Label.en: I looking at those pictures to see how it progressed month by month
Label.fr: Tu peux en suivre la progression sur ces images
Label.es: I looking at those pictures to see how it progressed month by month
Label.zh: I looking at those pictures to see how it progressed month by month

Label.en: Anyway, here comes yet another reason the tower is lucky to be here...
Label.fr: Il y a cependant une autre raison pour laquelle il est improbable de la voir trôner sur Paris de nos jours ...
Label.es: Anyway, here comes yet another reason the tower is lucky to be here...
Label.zh: Anyway, here comes yet another reason the tower is lucky to be here...

Label.en: Well, I have yet another reason the tower is lucky to be here...
Label.fr: Il y a une autre raison pour laquelle on peut s'estimer heureux qu'elle soit encore là...
Label.es: Well, I have yet another reason the tower is lucky to be here...
Label.zh: Well, I have yet another reason the tower is lucky to be here...
